full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZHI BRGYA BA'I RNAM BSHAD LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO RGYAL TSAB RJES MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
publisher_(хэвлэсэн_буюу_бүтээсэн_хийд_б: DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING, KUN DGA' CHOS GLING,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @126A *, ,BSTAN BCOS BZHI BRGYA BA'I RNAM BSHAD LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSLAB PA RIN PO CHE LA GCES SPRAS SU MDZAD CING, ,SDOM PA GSUM DANG LDAN PA'I BLA MA NAM MKHA' BZANG PO PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR DU THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RGYAS PA'I KHUR GYIS MI NGAL BA'I BLA MA GRAGS SENG BAS 'BUL BA ME TOG GI RIM PA RGYA CHEN PO DANG BCAS PAS MDO KHAMS STOD NAS YANG DANG YANG DU BSKUL ZHING, ,MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG MANG DU THOS PA'I SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHEN PO, RTZE THANG PA KUN DGA' SENG GE LA SOGS PA, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DU MAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,RGYAL BA'I RING LUGS PA CHEN PO KHYAD PAR DU PHYI NANG GI RTEN 'BREL RNAMS CHU NANG GI ZLA BA'I GZUGS BRNYAN LTAR THUGS SU CHUD PA'I SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RJE BTZUN DAM PA RED MNGA' PA GZHON NU BLO GROS KYI ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG, ,RGYAL BA RNAMS KYI DAM PA'I CHOS 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM LEGS PAR GRUB PA, ,SNYIGS DUS KYI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO, ,RJE RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG @0126B GRAGS PA'I DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG, ,YAB SRAS GNYIS KYI ZHABS KYI RDUL YUN RING DU GUS PAS BSTEN CING, ,DE GNYIS KYI LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I BKA' DRIN LAS, ,RIGS PA SMRA BA DGE SLONG DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS, ,'BROG RI BO CHE DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL LO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVA STI, ,RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR KUN DGA' CHOS GLING 'DIR, ,PAR DU BZHENGS NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,
